title: Let It Glow (from “Frozen Northern Lights”)
lyrics:
[Verse 1: Olivia Rodrigo, 
Madison Hu
 & 
Both
]
When the sky's awake
With crazy colors, green and blue
You might be sayin', "That's fake"
We're here to tell you
 
it's true
Call 'em Northern Lights
Aurora borealis, ya know
The sky wakes up at night
, 
so let it glow
Gotta head up north, where it's always snowin'
There's a party in the sky, Mother Nature's throwin'
Stuff flyin' by, million miles an hour
So let's break down this firepower
[Pre-Chorus: Olivia Rodrigo & 
Madison Hu
]
It all starts with the sun
And the solar wind
The charge particles collide with oxygen
And nitrogen
[Interlude: Madison Hu, 
Olivia Rodrigo
 & 
Both
]
Paige, I'm so sorry
Are you okay?
Way better than okay
We're natural phenomenon
[Chorus: Olivia Rodrigo & Madison Hu]
Let it glow, let it glow
This technicolor vision is way out of control
Let it glow, let it glow
Where the Earth's magnetic fields play a crucial role

[Verse 2: Madison Hu, 
Olivia Rodrigo
 & 
Both
]
It's plasma, y'all
Northern Lights shine bright when the right conditions fall
It's the greatest light show 
that ya know
Throwin' sciency flow
So hot, it could melt a snow cone
'Cause it's light out
 when it's night out
Not myth or lore, 
not gonna make stuff up no more
It's show and tell, and it's time to flow
Olaf is right, 
and here we go
